title: [Poster] Next-Generation Immunobiology Data Integration, Analysis and Visualization
summary:
Nodality has pioneered a novel flow cytometry-based technology in the
areas of oncology and autoimmunity to reveal underlying disease biology.
We present a custom framework written in Python that uses Django,
Matplotlib, MongoDB and Pandas to join this experimental data with
clinical facts such as individual patient disease outcomes to develop
actionable biological and clinical information.
